Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.colorindexer

Class ColorIndexerOpImage

Object
PlanarImage
OpImage
PointOpImage
ColorIndexerOpImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
RenderedImage, ImageImageN, PropertyChangeEmitter, PropertySource, WritablePropertySource
public class ColorIndexerOpImage extends PointOpImage
PointOpImage to perform a color inversion given a certain ColorIndexer. Derived and improved from GeoTools one
Author:
Andrea Aime, GeoSolutions

  • Method Details

    • computeTile

      public Raster computeTile(int tx, int ty)
      Description copied from class: PointOpImage
      Computes a tile. If source cobbling was requested at construction time, the source tile boundaries are overlayed onto the destination and computeRect(Raster[], WritableRaster, Rectangle) is called for each of the resulting regions. Otherwise, computeRect(PlanarImage[], WritableRaster, Rectangle) is called once to compute the entire active area of the tile.

      The image bounds may be larger than the bounds of the source image. In this case, samples for which there are no corresponding sources are set to zero.

      Overrides:
      computeTile in class PointOpImage
      Parameters:
      tx - The X index of the tile.
      ty - The Y index of the tile.
